item.description:
Otra meetup de conversaciones amistosas en español. Nos encantaría ver más hablantes nativos de español, pero todos son bienvenidos.

Another meetup for friendly conversations in Spanish. We'd love to see more native speakers , but everyone is welcome.

En este Meetup vamos hablar sobre el libro "El Cuento de Ferdinando". Por favor, lo lee antes la reunion.

Lisa suggested we have a book discussion about El Cuento de Ferdinando ("The Story of Ferdinand in Spanish") by Munro Leaf. It's not difficult to read and the story should generate lots of spanish conversation.

Nos vemos,
Don

group.name: South Shore Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: SS Spanish Meetup at Borders Cafe en Braintree Wed. 1/5/2011 at 7:00 PM
